dashboard.label: Leaderboard
dashboard.definition:
{"dataSources":{"ds_search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=spl_bee category!=Setup| eval search_length=len(search)| eval Contestant=if(realname="",username,realname)| table Contestant search search_length | sort 0 + search_length | head 5","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$time_token.earliest$","latest":"$time_token.latest$"}},"name":"shortest_queries"},"ds_search_2":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=spl_bee|lookup splbee_questions.csv Category as category Number as question OUTPUT Answer 
| eval Contestant=if(realname="",username,realname)|eval correct = if(answer=Answer,1,0)|stats count(search) as searches count(eval(correct=1)) as correct by Contestant|eval Correct_Submissions=round((correct/searches)*100,2)|sort 0 - Correct_Submissions
| fields - searches correct
| head 10","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$time_token.earliest$","latest":"$time_token.latest$"}},"name":"questions_answered"},"ds_search_3":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=_audit sourcetype=audittrail action=search total_run_time=* search="*sendanswer'" search=*inputlookup* search!="* server_power.csv | stats count as answer | sendanswer"|stats max(total_run_time) as run_duration by user search|sort 0 + run_duration|head 5
| rex mode=sed field=search "s/'(.*)'/\1/g"","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$time_token.earliest$","latest":"$time_token.latest$"}},"name":"shortest_duration"},"ds_search_4":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=spl_bee 
| eval Contestant=if(realname="",username,realname)| stats latest(answer) as User_Answer latest(_time) as LatestSubmissionTime count(search) as Submissions by Contestant category question |rename question as Number category as Category | convert ctime(LatestSubmissionTime)|lookup splbee_questions.csv Category Number OUTPUT Answer| eval Correct = if(User_Answer=Answer,1,0) | table Category Number Contestant LatestSubmissionTime Correct Submissions | sort - Correct + LatestSubmissionTime | streamstats count as row by Category Number| eval Points = if(Correct=1,101-row,0)|eval Bonus=case(Submissions=1 AND Correct=1,25,Submissions<=2 AND Correct=1,15,Submissions<=3 AND Correct=1,5,1=1,0)|eval total_points=Bonus+Points | fields - row | rename Number AS Q
","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$time_token.earliest$","latest":"$time_token.latest$"}},"name":"results"},"ds_search_5":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"query":"| eval questions=Category.Q| stats sum(total_points) as Points sum(Correct) as Correct sum(Submissions) as Submissions dc(questions) as Questions_Answered by Contestant
| sort - Points","extend":"ds_search_4"},"name":"results_table"},"ds_search_6":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"query":"|convert mktime(LatestSubmissionTime) as _time timeformat="%m/%d/%Y %T"|sort 0 Contestant + _time|streamstats sum(total_points) as total by Contestant|timechart limit=10 fixedrange=f span=5m useother=f sum(total) as points by Contestant|filldown *","extend":"ds_search_4"},"name":"point_timechart"}},"inputs":{"input_1":{"type":"input.timerange","title":"Select A Time Range:","options":{"token":"time_token","defaultValue":"-24h@h,now"}}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"submitButton":false,"display":"auto-scale","height":1000,"width":1601,"showTitleAndDescription":false},"structure":[{"item":"viz_line_1","type":"block","position":{"x":670,"y":0,"w":870,"h":350}},{"item":"viz_table_1","type":"block","position":{"x":670,"y":710,"w":870,"h":290}},{"item":"viz_table_3","type":"block","position":{"x":670,"y":1000,"w":870,"h":320}},{"item":"viz_table_4","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":670,"h":1000}},{"item":"viz_7xdmnM06","type":"block","position":{"x":670,"y":330,"w":870,"h":380}}],"globalInputs":["input_1"]},"description":"","title":"Leaderboard","defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{}}}}},"visualizations":{"viz_table_1":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"wrap":true,"rowNumbers":false,"dataOverlayMode":"heatmap","drilldown":"none","count":8},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_1"},"title":"Top 5 Shortest Search Queries"},"viz_table_3":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"wrap":true,"rowNumbers":false,"dataOverlayMode":"heatmap","drilldown":"none","count":8},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_3"},"title":"Top 5 Fastest Running Searches"},"viz_table_4":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"wrap":true,"rowNumbers":false,"dataOverlayMode":"none","drilldown":"none","count":100,"showInternalFields":false},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_5"},"title":"Results"},"viz_line_1":{"type":"splunk.line","options":{"yAxisTitleText":"","nullValueDisplay":"zero","xAxisTitleText":""},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_6"},"title":"Leaders Over Time"},"viz_7xdmnM06":{"type":"splunk.bar","options":{"xAxisTitleText":"","yAxisTitleText":"% Correct Submissions","legendDisplay":"off"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_2"},"showProgressBar":false,"showLastUpdated":false,"title":"Percentage of Correct Submissions"}}}
